name: Rage Quit (itch) (Gamepla4)
description:
A Very Difficult ... Game? 

Scratch That, Social Experiment.

Controls:

(A/D)/(Left/Right): Move Left and Right.

Space: Jump.

R: Reset.

Other Unique Stuff:

Randomized Stats For Extra Pain!

The Camera Rotates With You!

Just Get To The Circle!

Cool Things!

Areas:

Main Area: You'll Be Seeing This Place A Lot!

Saw Sanctuary: Saws Galore!

Long Hallway: It's Pretty Long!

The Green Room: No Relaxation!

Hellish Border: You'll Have One Hell Of A Time!

The End: No Spoilers For You!
